subject: Re: Desktop firewall
body:
Hello,
very interesting, but I guess it is still "too much" for home "innocent"
users.
A less frightening (for average novice user) could be lokkit, a *very*,
very  basic home desktop firewall.
Not for corporate user, nor having detailed configuration or monitoring,
but usefull for the  novice.
Firestarter could be offered for a desktop power user.
Regards.
Andre Felipe Machado
